channel.title: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong

item.title: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

You’ve made a NPC wrong in the Autospawn.Cfg. The 45 is representing that NPC’s id number.

Hah. First, even says “LoadNPCDrops” and also, 45 is not the NPC id… It’s the index that the program attempted to access.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong

item.title: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

<3 deathschaos. Thanks so much.
Scape-JAVA, I’m not smart enough to figure it out my self haha, thanks for trying to encourage non-spoon feeding though haha

item.source: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong

item.title: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

The error was thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index. The index is either negative or greater than or equal to the size of the array.
http://download.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.html

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong

item.title: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“Imnotokkk, post:4, topic:364885”]Haha who do i listen to?[/quote]Deathschaos9.

The 45 was thrown as ArrayIndexOutOfBounds - Means the number was too high.

As John, Deathschaos9, showed you the code:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:3, topic:364885”]NPCHandler class

Find:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45];

Change the 45 to 300

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][300];

You can now have 100 drops per npc instead of 15 (Which is what threw that error)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error, can't tell whats wrong
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

NPCHandler class

Find:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45];

Change the 45 to 300

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][300];

You can now have 100 drops per npc instead of 15 (Which is what threw that error)
